subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Egypt opened the defense of its African Cup of Nations title by defeating Cameroon, 4-2, Tuesday as Mohamed Zidan and Hosni Abd Rabou scored two goals each. In Tuesday’s other game, Sudan beat Zambia, 3-0.
snippet: Egypt opened the defense of its African Cup of Nations title by defeating Cameroon, 4-2, Tuesday as Mohamed Zidan and Hosni Abd Rabou scored two goals each. In Tuesday’s other game, Sudan beat Zambia, 3-0.
